s0301: Pardoned the world, like the Yimao pardon edict.
s0302: Places passed through have no corvee labor.
s0303: Matters from two years ago, all do not hear and investigate.'
s0304: Again issued edict: 'Anciently the Son of Heaven toured every five years, performed ceremonies at Mount Tai, lords had places to lodge for court.
s0305: Order the lords each to build lodges below Mount Tai.'
s0306: The Son of Heaven having already performed feng and shan at Mount Tai, without wind rain disaster, but the fangshi further said the Penglai immortal mountains might be obtainable, the emperor then joyfully hoped to encounter them, again went east to the sea to gaze, hoped to encounter Penglai.
s0307: Fengche Zi Hou suddenly fell ill, died in one day.
s0308: The emperor then departed, along the seacoast, north to Jieshi, toured from Liaoxi, passed the northern border to Jiuyuan.
s0310: The officials said the precious tripod emerged as Yuan Ding, made this year Yuanfeng first year.
